t: Tech Across Borders: Latin America’s Amazon Rival - U-M Ross Business+Tech
s: February 8, 2023 - Having learned about and met leaders of technology startups and companies in Argentina, I became fascinated by the MercadoLibre, an e-commerce company focused on serving the nascent but fast-growing Latin American markets. It can be described as the Amazon of Latin America.
